content.question: Which of the following correctly indicates the initial direction of the acceleration of Sphere <math alttext="N" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi> </math>?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow that points sharply upward and to the right.
The figure shows an arrow that points slightly upward and to the right.
The figure shows an arrow that points sharply downward and to the left.
The figure shows an arrow that points slightly upward and to the left.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow that points sharply upward and to the right.
